mapper.select: SELECT SELLBRAND as sellbrand, SELLKINDS as sellkinds, SELLDATA as selldata, SELLINVEN as sellinven, SELLPRICE as sellprice, SELLINFO as sellinfo, SELLIMAGE as sellimage, SELLCREATE as sellcreate, BKSR as bksr, SELLUSR as sellusr FROM selllist
mapper.insert: insert into selllist (sellbrand, sellkinds, selldata, sellcreate, sellprice) values (#{sellbrand}, #{sellkinds}, #{selldata}, #{sellcreate}, #{sellprice})
